column4: what's the difference between flashplayer-mozilla and flashplugin-nonfree. I have flashplugin-nonfree installed and flash works. don't both packages provide flash?
nonfree is from Macromedia and is not open source. Flashplayer is open source
then why are they bothin multiverse?
if flashplayer-mozilla is open source it should be in main or universe- not multiverse
